_metadata.prd_section: P0 - CLI Commands for Knowledge Management
_metadata.description: Provide CLI interface for knowledge exploration and management operations

requirements.title: Required standard commands
requirements.description: CLI provides status, help, and version commands as per scenario lifecycle contract

requirements.title: Search command
requirements.description: knowledge-observatory search <query> performs semantic search and displays ranked results

requirements.title: Health command
requirements.description: knowledge-observatory health displays knowledge system quality metrics

requirements.title: Graph command
requirements.description: knowledge-observatory graph generates knowledge relationship visualization data

requirements.title: CLI error handling
requirements.description: Graceful error messages for missing API, invalid arguments, and resource unavailability
requirements.notes: Non-zero exit codes for errors, helpful error messages
